text: ai eemaanavaalon mazabootee ke saath insaaf par qaayam raho aur khuda ke laye gavaahee do agarache (ye gavaahee) khud tumhaare ya tumhaare mo baap ya qaraabatadaaron ke lie khilaaf (hee kyo) na ho khvaah maaladaar ho ya mohataaj (kyonki) khuda to (tumhaaree banisbat) unapar jyaada meharabaan hai to tum (haq se) kataraane mein khvaahishe nafasiyaanee kee pairavee na karo aur agar ghuma phira ke gavaahee doge ya bilkul inkaar karoge to (yaad rahe jaisee karanee vaisee bharanee kyonki) jo kuchh tum karate ho khud usase khoob vaaqif hai
